attributes.action: Scrap plans to turn off FM radio.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Digital Radio DAB is inferior to FM radio in audio sound quality and suffers poor battery life for portable radio's. I therefore call on the PM to abandon plans to turn off FM radio until a better Digital Radio Standard is common place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
